cause.description:
This group is now under the authority of Wayne Roberts and Regan Howard. This cause has taken on a life of its own, and when I created it I was not prepared for this level of membership. Both Wayne and Regan's passion for the cause is some of the most enthusiastic I've seen and they will make a great administrators.
If you have any questions about anything, feel free to message either of them or I. Thank you.
- Michael O. Powell
_____________________________
